author: jaffar21
name: NBAFantasy
short: Play NBA Fantasy directly in Discord.
description: A fully-featured NBA Fantasy cog for Discord where users can draft players, manage their rosters, and compete in leagues.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the NBA Fantasy cog. Please make sure to load it using `[p]load nbafantasy`.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores discord user IDs to keep track of their fantasy teams and league participation.
